entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 01:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
